text: Zuzana Haasová (born 20 March 1981) is a Slovak actress and singer. She studied at the . Haasová played Soňa Jančová in the Slovak soap Panelák between 2008 and 2015. She performs music as part of the Susie Haas Band. Haasová has type 1 diabetes. She is the youngest of three sisters. == Selected filmography == *Najmenší hrdinovia (television, 1989) *Dvadsaťštyri hodín zo života istej ženy (TV film, 1994) *Pod vŕbou (TV film, 1994) *O krásnej strige (TV film, 1994) *O Zorali a dvoch bratoch (1994) *Škriatok (1995) *Silvánovci (1996) *Duchovia (1997) *Cruel Joys (2002) *Ordinácia v ružovej záhrade (television, 2007) *Panelák (television, 2008–2015) *Rex (television, 2017) == References == ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak female singers Category:Slovak film actresses Category:Slovak television actresses Category:People from Bratislava Category:20th-century Slovak actresses Category:21st-century Slovak actresses Category:People with type 1 diabetes Category:21st-century women singers
title: Zuzana Haasová
